DOC.brief_summary: Prospective randomized clinical trial to assess the effect of in-hospital intensive counseling and follow-up vs. usual care, on re-admission rates of patients with Asthma. The study population will include asthma patients admitted to internal Medicine departments and medical ICU at Soroka University Medical Center, due to asthma exacerbation.
DOC.brief_title: In-patient Asthma Counseling by Pulmonologist and Hospital Re-admission Rate
